title: (x) Dyson Bauhaus-like logo sans - custom designed {Andrew J. Sipe}
content: cool look - can any one name it?
author: scarchord

comments.content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140305061522im_/http:/typophile.com/files/dyson_logo2_5050.jpg)

It is much nicer if you post the image directly. :^)

It's custom.  
_AGFA Monotype has a long list of clients who've made use of our custom type services. Recently completed projects include 'Mylius Sans Headline Extra Bold' for British Airways._We've also recently helped the people at Dyson develop a custom font from their logo _and we've reworked much of the London Underground typeface family, 'New Johnston TFL', making it more suited to modern computer environments._
Similar fonts: Bayer Sans and Bauhaus, House Industries Neutraface and Chalet .

Also Ubuntu's Title Font is similar in a rounded sense. I can be downloaded here: [https://wiki.ubuntu.com/DIYMarketing#head-f0bb61686afeac4fd9af60297b48b6...](http://web.archive.org/web/20140305061522/https:/wiki.ubuntu.com/DIYMarketing#head-f0bb61686afeac4fd9af60297b48b692a544dd11 "https://wiki.ubuntu.com/DIYMarketing#head-f0bb61686afeac4fd9af60297b48b692a544dd11")

here's another along the Ubuntu line: [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/insigne/chennai/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140305061522/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/insigne/chennai/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/insigne/chennai/")
